This version of the Renegade Racing vest has been modified from its original form. The Renegade Racing vest provides protection against road rash without adding to your lap time. Graphene-based nanocomposite plating makes the vest extremely light yet ultra-durable. Ideal for everything from idyllic rides to heart pounding last laps.
